Feb. 10, 1974 D North West Association Contest (Third Section)
NWABBA Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-contest-third-section
Swiss Festival Overture [Ball]
Bolton Town Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK First Prize: The Watney Rose Bowl and £45. Second Prize: The Baxendall Trophy and £30. Third Prize: The Association Shield and £18. Fourth Prize: The Squires Cup and £7.
